h3_title: Yaoguai Chief - Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud
content: The lasers can be avoided by dodging or jumping over them, and the projectiles can be outrun or you can dodge to stop them hitting you. When there are numerous, we'd recommend outrunning them, and when there are just a few, dodge out of the way. During this fight, you want to stay as close to Cloudy Mist as possible, to remove the advantage of his long-range attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud'.
The content is as follows:
The lasers can be avoided by dodging or jumping over them, and the projectiles can be outrun or you can dodge to stop them hitting you. When there are numerous, we'd recommend outrunning them, and when there are just a few, dodge out of the way. During this fight, you want to stay as close to Cloudy Mist as possible, to remove the advantage of his long-range attacks.
